statements: SELECT * FROM dance_class_schedule WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, start_time FROM dance_class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT class_id, class_name, end_time FROM dance_class_schedule WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT instructor_id, class_name FROM dance_class_schedule WHERE end_time < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM dance_class_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC, instructor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM dance_class_schedule WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM dance_class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 5 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM dance_class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 3 AND start_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT class_name, instructor_id FROM dance_class_schedule WHERE end_time < '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY instructor_id, start_time;
SELECT class_id, start_time, end_time FROM dance_class_schedule WHERE class_id IN (2, 4, 6) AND instructor_id = 7 ORDER BY class_id DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM dance_classes;
SELECT class_name, scheduled_time FROM dance_classes WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, expertise FROM instructors ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(class_id) AS total_classes FROM dance_classes;
SELECT * FROM dance_classes WHERE scheduled_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM dance_classes WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id FROM dance_classes WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE expertise = 'Salsa';
SELECT class_name, scheduled_time FROM dance_classes WHERE instructor_id = 2 ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, expertise FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule;
SELECT instructor_name, expertise FROM instructors;
SELECT schedule_id, class_date, instructor_id FROM class_schedule ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, attendance_date, present FROM student_attendance WHERE present = TRUE;
SELECT class_name, class_date, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, class_name, class_date, instructor_id FROM class_schedule WHERE class_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE expertise = 'Mathematics';
SELECT student_id, attendance_date, present FROM student_attendance WHERE present = TRUE ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT c.class_name, i.instructor_name, s.attendance_date FROM class_schedule c JOIN instructors i ON c.instructor_id = i.instructor_id JOIN student_attendance s ON c.schedule_id = s.schedule_id;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT class_name, time_slot FROM class_schedule WHERE capacity > 20;
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE instructor_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT class_id, time_slot, instructor_id FROM class_schedule WHERE capacity IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE capacity > 20 ORDER BY class_id DESC
SELECT class_name, time_slot, instructor_id FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 3
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE age >= 20 AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%'

SELECT student_name, class_name, date FROM students JOIN student_attendance ON students.student_id = student_attendance.student_id JOIN class_schedule ON student_attendance.class_id = class_schedule.class_id WHERE status = 'Absent'
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, phone_number FROM class_schedule JOIN instructors ON class_schedule.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id
SELECT * FROM instructor;
SELECT name, bio FROM instructor WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, date FROM class ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student.name, attendance.is_present FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.id = attendance.student_id;
SELECT class.name AS class_name, instructor.name AS instructor_name FROM class JOIN schedule ON class.id = schedule.class_id JOIN instructor ON schedule.instructor_id = instructor.id;
SELECT * FROM instructor WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, bio FROM instructor ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT s.id, c.name, i.name AS instructor_name FROM schedule s JOIN class c ON s.class_id = c.id JOIN instructor i ON s.instructor_id = i.id;
SELECT st.name AS student_name, a.is_present FROM student st JOIN attendance a ON st.id = a.student_id WHERE a.is_present = true;
SELECT c.name, COUNT(a.id) AS total_attendance FROM class c LEFT JOIN schedule s ON c.id = s.class_id LEFT JOIN attendance a ON s.id = a.schedule_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY total_attendance DESC;
